A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The more I think I about it the more I’m disappointed in the lack of single story writer telling the trilogy. It’s full of disappointments and odd decisions. Overall it some moments\, but it’s not like Force awakens and feels like to many poor decisions where made based on you needing to read other books and stuff to get the full story... (why wasn’t it Akbar who did the suicide light speed thing? It would have been so much more impactful) Ryan just dumped so much JJ set up in 7... Hope JJ can redeem the story in 9. Force awakens and Rogue One are infinitely rewatchable\, we will see about this one\, once we can get it for home... —- update Got the blu-ray Nope it gets worse. Hard to watch again...
